data.criteria: The initial search was conducted in the following databases on 26. August 2019: Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL), EbscoHost/MEDLINE, Ovid/Embase, EbscoHost/PsychINFO, and Web of Science. A combination of keywords (including MeSH terms) indicating culturally adapted IMI for health promotion has been used. The search terms are published in this review’s protocol93 and cover comprehensively both the topic of the present review as well as one of a parallel systematic review on culturally adapted IMI for mental health conditions94,67. There were no restrictions on the publication date. A search update was conducted on 15 October 2020.
